member.name: T:Tasty.SqlServer.AssemblyImportScript
member.summary: Provides access to the assembly import SQL script.

member.name: M:Tasty.SqlServer.AssemblyImportScript.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the assembly import SQL script.
member.param: The path to v3.5 reference assemblies on the SQL Server machine (e.g., C:\Program Files\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.5).

member.name: T:Tasty.SqlServer.ClrFunctions
member.summary: A collection of helper functions that can be imported to SQL Server.

member.name: M:Tasty.SqlServer.ClrFunctions.RegexIsMatch(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the given input string matches the given regular expression.
member.param: The input to check against the regular expression.
The regular expression patter to check.
A value indicating whether to ignore case.
A value indicating whether to treat the input as multiline.
member.returns: True if the input string matches the regular expression, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Tasty.SqlServer.ClrFunctions.RegexReplace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces matches of the given regulare expression string on the given input string with the given replacement string.
member.param: The input string to replace matches on.
The regular expression pattern identifying the replacements to make.
The replacement string to use.
A value indicating whether to ignore case.
A value indicating whether to treat the input as multiline.
member.returns: The result of the replacement operation.

member.name: M:Tasty.SqlServer.ClrFunctions.RegexSplit(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Splits the given input string using the given regular expression.
member.param: The input string to split.
The regular expression pattern to split the string on.
A value indicating whether to ignore case.
A value indicating whether to treat the input as multiline.
member.returns: The input string split using the given regular expression.

member.name: M:Tasty.SqlServer.ClrFunctions.StringSetContainsAny(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether any of the values in a string set are equal to any of the values in a second string set. The string sets are tokenized by the given separator, which will default to the newline (\n) character if null or empty.
member.param: The reference string set to check.
The asking string set to check.
The separator to use when splitting the strings into sets.
member.returns: True if any of the values are equal, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Tasty.SqlServer.ClrFunctions.CreateRegexOptions(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a enumeration using the given indicators.
member.param: A value indicating whether to include .
A value indicating whether to include .

member.name: M:Tasty.SqlServer.ClrFunctions.FillRegexSplitRow(System.Object,System.String@)
member.param: The object containing values to be used when filling the row.
The first column value.
